mapper.select: SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.category, DECODE(TRUNC(SYSDATE), TRUNC(b.regdate), TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS regdate, b.updatedate, m.nickname FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.M_ID ORDER BY b.bno DESC

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.category, CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) = TRUNC(b.regdate) THEN TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS') ELSE TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS regdate, b.updatedate, m.nickname, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS savePath, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || 's_' || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS s_savePath FROM ( SELECT b2.bno, b2.title, b2.writer, b2.content, b2.m_id, b2.visitcount, b2.likecount, b2.category, b2.regdate, b2.updatedate FROM board b2 WHERE b2.regdate >= SYSDATE - 3 ORDER BY b2.likecount DESC ) b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN b_img a ON b.bno = a.bno
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
ORDER BY b.likecount DESC

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.category, CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) = TRUNC(b.regdate) THEN TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS') ELSE TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS regdate, b.updatedate, m.nickname, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS savePath, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || 's_' || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS s_savePath FROM ( SELECT b2.bno, b2.title, b2.writer, b2.content, b2.m_id, b2.visitcount, b2.likecount, b2.category, b2.regdate, b2.updatedate FROM board b2 WHERE b2.regdate >= SYSDATE - 3 AND b2.category = 'free' ORDER BY b2.likecount DESC ) b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN b_img a ON b.bno = a.bno
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
ORDER BY b.likecount DESC

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.category, CASE WHEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) = TRUNC(b.regdate) THEN TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS') ELSE TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS regdate, b.updatedate, m.nickname, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS savePath, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || 's_' || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS s_savePath FROM ( SELECT b2.bno, b2.title, b2.writer, b2.content, b2.m_id, b2.visitcount, b2.likecount, b2.category, b2.regdate, b2.updatedate FROM board b2 WHERE b2.regdate >= SYSDATE - 3 AND b2.category = 'healing' ORDER BY b2.likecount DESC ) b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN b_img a ON b.bno = a.bno
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
ORDER BY b.likecount DESC

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, decode(trunc(sysdate), trunc(b.regdate), to_char(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS savePath, decode(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || 's_' || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS s_savepath, COUNT(r.rno) AS replycount FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN b_img a ON b.bno = a.bno LEFT JOIN reply r ON b.bno = r.bno WHERE b.category = 'free'
GROUP BY b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname, a.filetype, a.uploadpath, a.uuid, a.filename ORDER BY b.bno DESC

GROUP BY b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname, a.filetype, a.uploadpath, a.uuid, a.filename ORDER BY b.bno DESC

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, decode(trunc(sysdate), trunc(b.regdate), to_char(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS'), to_char(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname, DECODE(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS savePath, decode(a.filetype, 'I', a.uploadpath || 's_' || a.uuid || '_' || a.filename, '/default/NO_image.jpg') AS s_savepath, COUNT(r.rno) AS replycount FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.m_id LEFT JOIN b_img a ON b.bno = a.bno LEFT JOIN reply r ON b.bno = r.bno WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, b.regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname, a.filetype, a.uploadpath, a.uuid, a.filename ORDER BY b.bno DESC

SELECT b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.content, b.m_id, b.visitcount, b.likecount, DECODE(TRUNC(SYSDATE), TRUNC(b.regdate), TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(b.regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS regdate, b.updatedate, b.category, m.nickname FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.m_id = m.M_ID WHERE bno=#{bno} ORDER BY b.bno DESC
